en: Enter /start to start registration or /cancel to cancel the registration.\n\nFor technical support please contact

My name is Sam, I am a bot with Samantha Smith's Group. I will help you fill out a request for free online courses of foreign languages for Ukrainians. To cancel the registration process at any time, please enter /cancel Are you already teaching or taking classes with us?
It seems, we've met before. üòâ Are you sure you want to register another person from the same Telegram account?
Some of the following questions end in a pencil symbol (‚úé). This means that you will be able to edit this piece of information at the end of the registration process.
Please specify your name or your nickname for us to address you ‚úé
Are registering as a student or as a teacher?

We kindly ask you to carefully read our rules before signing up for Samantha‚Äôs courses. You are eligible for our free-of-charge courses if you are originally from Ukraine. Please consider the urgency of the language learning for you. Our resources are limited and we strive to help people from Ukraine who suffered from the war that started on 24 February 2022 who are currently residing in either Ukraine or other countries. We will not be able to help you with regular classes if your level of English is B2 or higher and you have been integrated into your new country of residence. Thank you for understanding! By tapping "Next" you confirm that you are from Ukraine and you need English classes.

What do you need to know about volunteering with us? ‚ú¶ Our teachers must be confident english speakers with B2+ level and be ready to give online classes two times a week for at least 4 months ‚ú¶ If you do not have teaching experience but you have good command of English and some free time, join us! We provide methodological support and you can seek advice from our amazing community ‚ú¶ We ask our teachers to reply to coordinators at least once a day if any organizational matters need to be addressed ‚ú¶ If your schedule is not consistent with providing regular classes, you can join us as a Speaking Club teacher or help with methodological support if you can do it. Please leave a relevant comment to your application regarding the same. We will be thrilled to welcome you as our volunteer! Please tap Next if you are willing to volunteer with us.
How old are you? We don't need your exact age, just choose the age group so we can find the best group for you
Unfortunately, teachers in our groups must be at least 18 years old. However, if you are 16 or older, you can host Speaking Clubs
I am old enough but won't host Speaking Clubs
I am 16 and I'm ready to host Speakinbg Clubs
Unfortunately, we will not be able to work with you. Thank you for your time!
Please, provide your pseudonym that will be used instead of your last name ‚úé
How did you find out about Samantha Smith's Group?
so that you don't have to give us your phone number. In this case, please make sure you don't change your username while you're with us.

Please provide your phone number in international format (starting with + or 00). The country code for Ireland is +353, for Ukraine +380. For the full list of country codes, you can consult e.g. this website. You can also simply press the button below to send us your current phone number ‚úé
Tap to share your phone number
This doesn't look like a valid email. Please try again.
doesn't seem like a valid phone number. Please try again.

A user with this name and contact details already exists. Please contact your coordinator.

If you already registered with me, you don't have to do it again: just wait until our coordinators find a group for you and contact you.

I am terminating the registration process. Bye for now!
What's your time zone? Choose your current time (the number in parentheses shows the difference to UTC) ‚úé
Move on to the next day ‚û°Ô∏è
You've selected no slots at all! Let's try again
What language do you want to learn? Please note that you can only choose one language right now. You can add a second language later on through your group coordinator.
What language(s) do you want to teach? ‚úé
How long have you been learning English?
Which student levels do yo prefer to teach?
What language (apart from the language being learnt) can you communicate in during classes? ‚úé

What language (apart from the language you teach) can you communicate in with students during classes? Please note that we are asking about your ability to speak Ukrainian or Russian fluently enough, not about your style of teaching ‚úé
Only in the language I teach

OK, now we're ready to begin your our placement test! It will take around 15 minutes. This test will help our coordinators and teachers pick the most suitable group for you. Please note that you will not be able to change your answers, so pay attention! Please press the button to proceed.
This is too hard üòñ Let's finish

Well done! To get more accurate results and find you a more suitable group for you, we would like to ask you to take a speaking test. It will take around 15 minutes, you will need to go to our partner's website. Are you willing to take the test and increase your chances of getting the right group for you?
Please follow the link below and come back to me when you have finished the test. The same link was sent to your email address.
‚û°Ô∏è Click or tap here to open the link ‚¨ÖÔ∏è
Can you give regular classes or host speaking clubs?
How many groups would you like to teach?
I can take two right away!
What age groups would you like to teach?
What additional help do you require? Please note that we only provide additional help once you have started to take group classes
What additional help can you provide to our students?
Help prepare or edit a CV
Advice on college admission outside Ukraine
I don't need any of these

Do you have any other skills that you think could help us or our students?

What a result! Unfortunately, we cannot provide you with regular classes, but we will be happy to see you in our Speaking Club that will help you improve your spoken English in an informal setting. Are you interested?
